1a
```{r}
set.seed(100)
n <- 100000
a <- NULL
b <- NULL
c <- NULL
d <- NULL
e <- NULL
f <- NULL
total <- NULL


for (i in 1:n){
  a[i] <- rnorm(1, 200, 20)
  b[i] <- rnorm(1, 50, 10)
  c[i] <- rnorm(1, 100, 15)
  d[i] <- rnorm(1, 150, 30)
  e[i] <- rnorm(1, 100, 30)
  f[i] <- rnorm(1, 100, 10)
  total[i] <- a[i] + b[i] + c[i] + d[i] + e[i] + f[i]
}

mean(total)
sd(total)
```
1b
```{r}
hist(total, xlab = 'total call center demand', main = 'Histogram of total call center demand')
```

2a
```{r}
set.seed(100)
n <- 100000
bat_life <- rnorm(n, 7, 2)
unitcost <- rep(0,n)
a <- 0
for (i in 1:n){
  if(bat_life[i]<=5){
     a<- 10 + 1.5* floor((5-bat_life[i])/(1/12))
       unitcost[i] = a
    
    }
  
}
avg_cost <- sum(unitcost)/n
avg_cost
```

2b
```{r}
p <- sum(unitcost!=0)/n 
p
```
2c
```{r}
avg_refund <- sum(unitcost)/sum(unitcost!=0)
avg_refund
```
